surfit::matlabVector Class Reference

vector of this type can be saved to matlab binary format More...

#include <matlab.h>

bool writeMAT (const char *filename, const char *name)

Detailed Description

Vectors, inherited from matlabVector can be saved into matlab binary file and then loaded in Matlab with "load" command.

See also:
http://www.mathworks.com/access/helpdesk/help/pdf_doc/matlab/matfile_format.pdf
